entityData.name: Plan
notes: Customers in a plan (with an active contract for a plan) are regarded as members.
Customers not in a plan (with no active contract for a plan) are regarded as contacts.
The Virtual offices tab is only shown when the plan is a virtual office plan.

reference.name: Plan details
reference.description: This section allows you to define the basic details of the plan, including its name, location availability, and description. Plans represent services customers subscribe to, such as coworking memberships or private offices.

fields.name: Plan name
fields.description: The name of the plan.
fields.notes: Must be unique within each of your locations.

fields.name: Available at
fields.description: The location this plan is available at.
fields.notes: If you choose a 'network' location, the plan will be available at all locations in that network.

fields.name: Cycle
fields.description: The billing cycle for the plan.
fields.notes: Displayed only if billing is not enabled.

fields.name: Plan description
fields.description: A detailed description of the plan.
fields.notes: Supports localized text.

reference.name: Virtual Office
reference.description: This section allows you to enable and manage Virtual Office plans, providing a dedicated tab for managing all related details.

fields.name: This plan is a virtual office plan
fields.description: Indicates if the plan is a virtual office plan.
fields.notes: Disabled if there are active contracts or if the virtual office feature is not active.

reference.name: Portal and Apps
reference.description: This section determines if and how the plan will be displayed on the website and the members' app.

fields.name: Display this plan on the website and the App
fields.description: Controls the visibility of the plan on the website and app.
fields.notes: If enabled, additional fields for category and display order are shown.

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The category under which the plan is listed.
fields.notes: Suggestions are provided based on existing group names.

fields.name: The position to display this plan at
fields.description: The order in which the plan is displayed.
fields.notes: Determines the display order on the website and app.

reference.name: Purchase links
reference.description: This section provides links to invite new or existing customers to sign up for the plan.
reference.messages: Displayed only if the plan has been saved.

fields.name: Invite link (new customers)
fields.description: Link for new customers to sign up for the plan.
fields.notes: Copy this link to share with potential new customers.

fields.name: Purchase link (existing customers)
fields.description: Link for existing customers to purchase the plan.
fields.notes: Copy this link to share with current customers.

reference.name: Pricing
reference.description: Set the pricing for plans, including the frequency of invoicing. Customers will be billed based on the selected number of weeks or months.

fields.name: Price
fields.description: The amount to be charged for the plan.
fields.notes: Select the currency for the price.

fields.name: Every
fields.description: Frequency of invoicing, either in weeks or months.
fields.notes: Choose between weeks or months for billing frequency.

reference.name: Additional invoices
reference.description: Decide if extra invoices should be issued for additional purchases during the billing cycle.

fields.name: Create additional invoices during the billing cycle.
fields.description: Option to generate extra invoices for additional purchases.
fields.notes: Enable this to issue invoices for purchases made between regular billing cycles.

fields.name: Every
fields.description: Frequency for additional invoices, in weeks or months.
fields.notes: Set the interval for issuing additional invoices.

reference.name: Billing day and prorating
reference.description: Set the default billing day and options for prorating the first and last invoices.

fields.name: Default billing day
fields.description: The day of the month when billing occurs.
fields.notes: Choose a specific day or the day the customer signs up.

fields.name: First invoice prorated discount
fields.description: Discount the first invoice based on the days left in the billing cycle.
fields.notes: Set the number of days for prorating.

fields.name: Prorate day of month
fields.description: Day of the month for applying prorate discount.
fields.notes: Select a specific day for prorating.

fields.name: Last invoice prorated discount
fields.description: Option to discount the last invoice based on the contract end date.
fields.notes: Choose whether to apply a discount to the last invoice.

fields.name: Advance payments
fields.description: Number of billing cycles to invoice in advance.
fields.notes: Set the number of cycles to bill upfront.

fields.name: Booking due date strategy
fields.description: Determine when charges for bookings are due.
fields.notes: Select a strategy for booking charges.

reference.name: Minimum price
reference.description: Ensure a minimum price is charged for the plan, considering various types of charges.

fields.name: Minimum price
fields.description: The lowest amount to be charged for the plan.
fields.notes: Specify the minimum price in the selected currency.

fields.name: Consider passes
fields.description: Include passes when calculating the minimum price.
fields.notes: Enable to factor in passes for minimum pricing.

fields.name: Consider bookings
fields.description: Include bookings when calculating the minimum price.
fields.notes: Enable to factor in bookings for minimum pricing.

fields.name: Consider events
fields.description: Include events when calculating the minimum price.
fields.notes: Enable to factor in events for minimum pricing.

reference.name: Virtual Office Onboarding
reference.description: This section allows you to configure virtual office features, including identity and address verification for customers. It ensures that customers meet specific requirements before their contracts are activated.

fields.name: Request Address Identity Check
fields.description: Customers in this plan are required to provide proof of address.
fields.notes: When enabled, the customer's contract will be paused until verification is complete.

fields.name: Address Identity Check Provider
fields.description: Select how you would like to check proof of address.
fields.notes: You can update preferences in the Identity Checks section.

fields.name: Address Identity Check Description
fields.description: Let your customers know which documents you accept as proof of address.
fields.notes: You can reuse a previous list if available.

fields.name: Repeat the Check (Address)
fields.description: Set how often the address check should be repeated.
fields.notes: Choose a repeat pattern for address verification.

fields.name: Keep Paused If Address Mismatch
fields.description: Keep contracts paused if the customer's address is outside your location country.
fields.notes: This applies even if the customer passes verification.

fields.name: Request Identity Check
fields.description: Customers in this plan are required to provide proof of ID.
fields.notes: When enabled, the customer's contract will be paused until verification is complete.

fields.name: Identity Check Provider
fields.description: Select how you would like to check proof of ID.
fields.notes: You can update preferences in the Identity Checks section.

fields.name: Identity Check Description
fields.description: Let your customers know which documents you accept as proof of identity.
fields.notes: You can reuse a previous list if available.

fields.name: Repeat the Check (Identity)
fields.description: Set how often the identity check should be repeated.
fields.notes: Choose a repeat pattern for identity verification.

fields.name: Send Onboarding Form by Email
fields.description: Send a custom onboarding form to customers purchasing this plan.
fields.notes: Select a form to send as part of the onboarding process.

fields.name: Select Form
fields.description: Choose the form to send to customers.
fields.notes: Add new forms in the Forms section.

reference.name: Virtual Office delivery handling
reference.description: This section allows you to configure delivery categories and their handling options for your virtual office plan. You can link delivery categories to specific handling actions and manage associated charges.

fields.name: Select delivery handling option
fields.description: Choose the handling options for each delivery type.
fields.notes: Ensure the handling options are enabled above to access more options.

fields.name: Add delivery type(s)
fields.description: Add new delivery categories to offer for this plan's customers.
fields.notes: You can only add delivery types if there are available options.

fields.name: Link charges to delivery handling options
fields.description: Link specific charges to each delivery handling option.
fields.notes: Use the dropdown to select charges for each handling type.

reference.name: Contacts limits
reference.description: Define limits for company aliases, nominated recipients, and forwarding addresses. This helps manage the number of additional contacts and addresses associated with the plan.

fields.name: Maximum additional company aliases
fields.description: Set the number of additional company aliases allowed, excluding the one provided during onboarding.
fields.notes: This is measured in aliases.

fields.name: Maximum additional recipients
fields.description: Set the number of additional nominated recipients allowed, excluding those provided during onboarding.
fields.notes: This is measured in recipients.

fields.name: Maximum forwarding addresses per recipient
fields.description: Set the maximum number of forwarding addresses allowed per recipient.
fields.notes: This is measured in addresses.

reference.name: Plan Benefits
reference.description: This section allows you to provide booking time or credits, check-in time, or printing credits to customers who are part of this plan.

reference.name: Discounts
reference.description: This section lets you set discounts for customers in this plan when they make bookings, purchase passes, or incur other charges.

fields.name: Bookings
fields.description: Discount percentage for bookings.
fields.notes: Default value is 20%. Members in this plan get a discount off their bookings.

fields.name: Passes
fields.description: Discount percentage for passes.
fields.notes: Default value is 20%. Members in this plan get a discount off their passes, including PAYG passes.

fields.name: Charges
fields.description: Discount percentage for charges.
fields.notes: Default value is 20%. Members in this plan get a discount off their charges.

reference.name: Plan limits
reference.description: This section allows you to set various limits and restrictions for the plan, such as the maximum number of members, cancellation policies, and other customer-related restrictions.

fields.name: Customers in this plan can cancel their plan from the portal or the app.
fields.description: Allows customers to cancel their plan through the portal or app.
fields.notes: Reversed logic: Unchecking this box means customers can cancel.

fields.name: Suspend newly signed up customers joining the plan.
fields.description: Automatically suspends new customers who sign up for this plan.
fields.notes: Useful for managing customer onboarding.

fields.name: Maximum number of members
fields.description: Sets a limit on the number of members allowed in this plan.
fields.notes: Default is 100 members; can be adjusted as needed.

fields.name: Minimum contract term
fields.description: Specifies the minimum duration a contract must be held before cancellation.
fields.notes: Calculated in cycles; default depends on billing frequency.

fields.name: Cancellation notice period
fields.description: Defines the notice period required for cancellation.
fields.notes: Default is 30 days; can be set to zero for no notice period.

fields.name: Automatic cancellation
fields.description: Determines if contracts will automatically cancel after a set number of cycles.
fields.notes: Default is 1 cycle; can be disabled.

fields.name: Unpaid account cancellation
fields.description: Suspends customer accounts with unpaid invoices after a specified period.
fields.notes: Only available if the Finance module is enabled; default is 30 days.

reference.name: Access days restrictions
reference.description: Set the number of days customers in this plan can access your locations by checking in. Members can check in and out multiple times during the same day using the same pass.
reference.messages: Use these restrictions carefully! These are hard limits. Once reached, customers cannot check in, book, or bring more guests.

fields.name: Days of access per billing cycle
fields.description: Limit the number of days per billing cycle customers can access.
fields.notes: Default is 20 days. Set to 0 for unlimited access.

fields.name: Days of access per month
fields.description: Limit the number of days per month customers can access.
fields.notes: Default is 20 days. Set to 0 for unlimited access.

fields.name: Days of access per week
fields.description: Limit the number of days per week customers can access.
fields.notes: Default is 5 days. Set to 0 for unlimited access.

reference.name: Access time restrictions
reference.description: Set the number of hours customers in this plan can access your locations by checking in.

fields.name: Hours of access per billing cycle
fields.description: Limit the number of hours per billing cycle customers can access.
fields.notes: Default is 100 hours. Set to 0 for unlimited access.

fields.name: Hours of access per month
fields.description: Limit the number of hours per month customers can access.
fields.notes: Default is 100 hours. Set to 0 for unlimited access.

fields.name: Hours of access per week
fields.description: Limit the number of hours per week customers can access.
fields.notes: Default is 5 hours. Set to 0 for unlimited access.

reference.name: Booking time restrictions
reference.description: Set the number of minutes customers in this plan can book resources.

fields.name: Booking minutes per month
fields.description: Limit the number of minutes per month customers can book.
fields.notes: Default is 600 minutes. Set to 0 for unlimited booking.

fields.name: Booking minutes per week
fields.description: Limit the number of minutes per week customers can book.
fields.notes: Default is 60 minutes. Set to 0 for unlimited booking.

reference.name: Visitor restrictions
reference.description: Set the number of visitors customers in this plan can receive.

fields.name: Visitors per month
fields.description: Limit the number of visitors per month customers can receive.
fields.notes: Default is 8 visitors. Set to 0 for unlimited visitors.

fields.name: Visitors per week
fields.description: Limit the number of visitors per week customers can receive.
fields.notes: Default is 2 visitors. Set to 0 for unlimited visitors.

fields.name: Visitors per day
fields.description: Limit the number of visitors per day customers can receive.
fields.notes: Default is 1 visitor. Set to 0 for unlimited visitors.

reference.name: Deposits, fees and components
reference.description: This section allows you to manage and charge customers for one-off sign-up fees, security deposits, and other components as part of their invoice for a specific plan.
reference.messages: Loading content message is displayed until data is fully loaded.

fields.name: Deposits and sign-up fees
fields.description: Displays the number of sign-up fees and deposits associated with the tariff.
fields.notes: A badge shows the count if there are any deposits or sign-up fees.

fields.name: Plan components
fields.description: Displays the number of components included in the plan.
fields.notes: A badge shows the count if there are any components.

reference.name: Legal terms
reference.description: This section allows you to define the legal terms and conditions that customers must agree to when signing up for a plan. If these terms are updated, customers will need to agree to them again upon their next login.

fields.name: Terms and Conditions
fields.description: The legal terms and conditions for the plan.
fields.notes: Use Markdown to format the terms and conditions.

description: In the Nexudus Platform, **Plans** are recurring membership options that define the access and services available to members. These plans can include options like hot-desk monthly memberships, private offices, virtual offices, part-time access plans, and dedicated desks. Members with active contracts for these plans are considered part of your community, while those without are simply contacts. Plans help manage and automate billing, access, and member benefits.
when: Use **Plans** when you want to offer recurring memberships that provide ongoing access and services. Avoid using Plans for one-off access, day passes, or non-recurring sales, as these do not fit the recurring nature of Plans.
